profile.name: Will McGugan
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering innovative solutions at Salesforce
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a passion for open-source development. Proficient in Rust systems programming and Python, with a strong focus on database sharding and terminal emulators.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented scalable database sharding solutions for high-traffic applications.
Developed and maintained terminal emulators using Rust, ensuring seamless user experience.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to open-source projects such as Textualize/textual and batrachianai/toad.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated the Textualize/textual project, ensuring its continued relevance and adoption.
Engaged with the open-source community to gather feedback and improve the project's overall quality.

experience.title: Python Developer
description: Developed and deployed Python-based applications, leveraging libraries such as pydantic for data validation.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to the growth of the open-source community.

Database Sharding: Understanding of data structures and validation using pydantic.
Experience with designing and implementing scalable database sharding solutions.
Terminal Emulators: Insight into user interface and terminal interactions through discussions on Textualize/textual.
Development and maintenance of terminal emulators using Rust.
